remarks: The supersets of a nonempty set which are also subsets of a given base set form a filter.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 12-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Aug-2015.)
statement:
supfil $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ B C_ A /\ B =/= (/) ) -> { x e. ~P A | B C_ x } e. ( Fil ` A ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
